metadata.title: USN-2593-1 -- Dnsmasq vulnerability
metadata.description: Nick Sampanis discovered that Dnsmasq incorrectly handled certain malformed DNS requests. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Dnsmasq to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2593-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dnsmasq - 2.68-1ubuntu0.1 dnsmasq-utils - 2.68-1ubuntu0.1 dnsmasq-base - 2.68-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
